tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Consultation provided for all pediatric disease,
review: My daughter was having a bad cough and I was worried. I was wondering who is a good paediatric available to show ,that's when my spouse searched in Google and got information about Dr Ganesh Kamath, after seeing the positive reviews we decided to go and consult the doctor and thankfully it was a wonderful experience. Dr Ganesh patiently listened to all the symptom and advised this is the issue. Such a soft spoken doctor. He will only prescribe medicine if required. I would highly recommend parents if they want to consult a paediatric please approach Dr. Ganesh

The doctor is very attentive and thorough, and always explains the cause of symptoms, course of treatment and action properly to us. 

We will very confident with him and even our child who is generally scared of going to hospitals feels comfortable with him.
We recommended the doctor to a family friend and they also had a very pleasant experience for their kids treatment.

Thank you so much.

i would have recommend the doc but with the experience with clinic i wont want anyone to visit this clinic. You can have ony 3 days for your follow up catch up with your doctor after you pay a consultation charge of Rs.600 and registration of Rs.160.How much you can observe the condition within 3days when you are getting medicine  advice for 5day.  What kind of policy does these clinics make. Is this what the doctors also supports if so then dont feel like visit the doctor again as they dont vaule the oath they have taken.

We are visiting him for our twin children. He listens to the patients condition very carefully and does his diagnosis with proper investigation. He really remembers previous illnesses and decides medicines after careful considerations.
One of the best part.. he answers all questions very patiently and this really reduces parent's worry up to a large extent.
Doctor has patience and he will listen to parents for the problems, *** ********* ***** ** ********* *** providedthe proper treatment for our child and is friendly. We are happy with the service

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We have been visiting Dr. Ganesh Kamath since 4 years now. He gives time to examine his young patients before prescribing a course of treatment. I have shifted to Whitefield but don't think twice before taking my son back to Koramangala for a checkup with him when needed.
He is  really a very good doctor, listens to each of the problems even a littlest silly question and gives time to the little patients and he enjoys his profession and doing proper justice..
Very good. He is patient and very understanding. He listens and takes very good care. My son is very comfortable.
He has been taking care of both my kids for 7 years now. Really good doctor. He also makes it a point to look at my kids general health every time I visit, not just tackle the immediate problem
